metadata.feature_description: View, sort, and manage the list of custom URLs

steps.action: Navigate to Pages > select URL Test Page > Advanced > S.E.O. tab
steps.expected: The URL list for the page should be displayed
steps.actual: URL list displayed showing all URLs for the page including custom and automatic URLs

steps.expected: Both custom URLs (user-created) and system-generated URLs should be shown with their properties
steps.actual: Three URLs displayed: /URL-Test-Page (Active 200, Automatic), /URL-Test-Page (Active 200, SuperUser Account - custom), /URLTestPage (Redirect 301, Automatic)

steps.action: Look for sorting controls on URL column header
steps.expected: Column header should be clickable to sort by URL path
steps.actual: Column headers are not clickable. No sorting controls exist in the UI.
No sorting occurred. Column headers do not respond to clicks.

issues: Sorting functionality exists in backend API (GetCustomUrls endpoint) but is NOT exposed in the PersonaBar UI. No sorting controls visible on column headers.

steps.action: Look for Locale column in the URL list
steps.expected: Locale column should be visible with sorting capability
steps.actual: No Locale column is displayed in the UI. Only URL, URL Type, and Generated By columns are shown.

issues: Code supports Locale sorting via API (SortingFields.Locale), but Locale column is not displayed in PersonaBar UI. Cannot test sorting by locale without UI element.

steps.action: Look for sorting controls on URL Type column header
steps.expected: Column header should be clickable to sort by status code
steps.actual: Column headers are not clickable. No sorting controls exist in the UI.

issues: Sorting by status code exists in backend API (SortingFields.Status) but is NOT exposed in the PersonaBar UI.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify correct display of URL properties

steps.action: Examine URL properties displayed in the list
steps.expected: URL path, URL type (status code), and source should be displayed
steps.actual: URL list correctly displays: URL path, URL Type (Active 200 or Redirect 301), Generated By (Automatic or username)

steps.action: Verify custom URLs have edit/delete controls
steps.expected: Custom URLs should have edit and delete icons
steps.actual: Custom URLs (created by SuperUser Account) display edit (pencil) and delete (trash) icons. System-generated URLs do not have these controls.

steps.action: Verify Home page URLs display correctly
steps.expected: Home page URLs should show all custom and automatic URLs with correct properties
steps.actual: Home page shows: / (Active 200, Automatic), /redirect-url-edited (Redirect 301, SuperUser Account), /test-url-alpha (Redirect 301, SuperUser Account)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test with empty custom URL list

steps.action: Navigate to Search Results page > Advanced > S.E.O. tab
steps.expected: Page with no custom URLs should display only system-generated URLs
steps.actual: Search Results page shows only one URL: /Search-Results (Active 200, Automatic). No custom URLs exist for this page.

steps.action: Verify the list handles empty custom URL state gracefully
steps.expected: System should display system-generated URLs even when no custom URLs exist
steps.actual: System correctly displays the automatic system-generated URL. Add URL button is available to create new custom URLs.

observations: Code review shows GetCustomUrls API supports sorting by URL (sortField=1), Locale (sortField=2), and Status (sortField=3) with ascending/descending order.
However, the PersonaBar UI does NOT expose any sorting controls. Column headers are not clickable.
The Locale column is not displayed in the UI, making locale-based sorting impossible to test via UI.
Sort by creation date is NOT supported in the code - SortingFields enum only has None, Url, Locale, and Status.
Custom URLs are managed on a per-page basis through Pages > [Page] > Advanced > S.E.O. tab, not through a global Custom URLs management screen.
